Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The course will include the following topics: inductive reasoning, factorization, the division algorithm and congruences.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Sets and mappings, groups, subgroups, permutation groups, homomorphisms and isomorphisms, the isomorphism theorems, groups actions, the class equation, Sylow theorems, and rings.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced topics in abstract algebra, including ring theory and field theory; introduction to Galois theory.

MAS3105H - Honors Matrix and Linear Alge.name: MAS3105H - Honors Matrix and Linear Algebra

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAC 2312 and permission of Honors or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Matrices, determinants, vector spaces over the reals, linear independence, basis, solutions of systems, range of linear transformations, eigenvectors, singular value decomposition. With Honors consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Matrices, determinants, vector spaces over the reals, linear independence, basis, solutions of systems, range of linear transformations, eigenvectors, singular value decomposition

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced topics in abstract algebra and discrete mathematics. Selection of topics will vary.
